Workflow: Internet

DNS

  • Slow
  • Big
  • Must be secure (complex realisation)
  • 48 hours to wait
  • Distributed, uses cash

Web-stack

  • LAMP - Linux, Apache, MySQL, PHP
  • WAMP - Windows, Apache, MySQL, PHP
  • MAMP - MacOS, Apache, MySQL, PHP
  • WISA - Windows, IIS, MS SQL, .NET
  • MARS - MySQL, Apache, Ruby, Solaris
